items.name: Aston Villa Purity Pale Can Case
items.desc:
To celebrate another year of Premier League football at Villa Park, we’ve produced a limited run of 330ml Purity Pale cans.
Created exclusively for Aston Villa; a zesty pale ale with a refreshing citrus finish. Brewed with only the finest Cascade hops, Maris Otter, wheat and crystal malts.
As we await the return of fans to Villa Park we have brewed this limited release of cans for you to continue to experience Villa Park experience at home.
Purity Brewing Company is proud to be the official ale supplier of Aston Villa Football Club.
12 x 330ml cans.

items.name: LIMITED EDITION Aston Villa Purity Pale Mini Keg
items.desc:
It’s back, Purity Pale 5L Mini Keg! Perfect for match days at home or the ideal gift for the Pure Villa Fan!
Created exclusively for Aston Villa; Purity Pale is a zesty pale ale with a refreshing citrus finish. Brewed with only the finest Cascade hops, Maris Otter, wheat and crystal malts.
Purity Brewing Company is proud to be the official ale supplier of Aston Villa Football Club.
5-litres (8.8 pints) of Aston Villa Purity Pale (ABV 4.2%) Pale Ale. Great for smaller gatherings. Features a built-in tap for pouring. Consume within 3 days for Optimum quality. Serve Chilled.

items.name: Wasps Gold Can Case
items.desc:
As Wasps Rugby gear up for a play-off charge with the restarted season we wanted to ensure Wasps fans were able to enjoy the same great beer at the Ricoh Arena but at home. We’ve produced a limited run of 330ml Wasps Gold cans.
Created exclusively for Wasps Rugby; a zesty golden ale with a refreshing citrus finish. Brewed with only the finest Styrian Goldings and Citra hops, Maris Otter, wheat and crystal malts.
As we await the return of fans to the Ricoh Arena we have brewed this limited release of cans for you to continue to experience Wasps Rugby experience at home.
Purity Brewing Company is proud to be the official ale supplier of Wasps Rugby Club.
12 x 330ml cans.
